医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
睡眠不足和高血压可能会增加脑损伤莫纳什大学的研究发现，患有高血压且缺乏睡眠的人认知能力下降和脑损伤更严重的风险可能会增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Short-sleep-and-high-blood-Pressure-may-increase-brain-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Short-sleep-and-high-blood-Pressure-may-increase-brain-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75d50c37-b730-4d0a-b679-52e14264779c Mon, 02 Dec 2024 23:22:00 -0500 Short sleep and high blood pressure may increase brain damage
从潜力到实践：医疗保健领域负责任的人工智能蓝图研究人员制定了全面的人工智能指南，以确保安全、公平和有效地融入医疗保健，并通过案例研究强调了环境文档应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/From-pottial-to-practice-A-blueprint-for-responsible-AI-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/From-pottial-to-practice-A-blueprint-for-responsible-AI-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=981d1502-064c-4c2b-a6e9-f7763f66d02a Mon, 02 Dec 2024 23:11:00 -0500 From potential to practice: A blueprint for responsible AI in healthcare
欧洲领导人敦促制定罕见病行动计划在布达佩斯举行的 EESC 高级别会议敦促新的欧盟委员会和欧盟成员国制定全面的政策框架，制定共同且可衡量的目标，以解决罕见病途径并进一步加强欧洲合作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/European-leaders-urged-to-develop-action-plan-for-rare-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/European-leaders-urged-to-develop-action-plan-for-rare-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fae86b0-ccbe-42ec-bd40-8830df8e939e Mon, 02 Dec 2024 23:02:00 -0500 European leaders urged to develop action plan for rare diseases
英国听力损失组织解决有关痴呆症的误导性说法英国领先的听力损失组织联手强调了一些健康专业人士和媒体的误导性报告，即听力损失会导致痴呆症，而治疗听力损失将降低我们个人患痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/UKe28099s-hearing-loss-organizations-address-misleading-claims-about-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/UKe28099s-hearing-loss-organizations-address-misleading-claims-about-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ac49160-81bc-46a8-b64d-96c6e40e5c8d Mon, 02 Dec 2024 22:48:00 -0500 UK’s hearing loss organizations address misleading claims about dementia
低水平的砷暴露与肾癌风险增加有关德克萨斯农工大学公共卫生学院的新研究结果表明，即使接触低含量的砷也会带来严重的健康风险，包括增加患肾癌的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Low-levels-of-arsenic-exposure-linked-to-increased-kidney-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Low-levels-of-arsenic-exposure-linked-to-increased-kidney-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=609cf5b9-f4a9-4650-bd19-fe1c0e7606a8 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 22:45:00 -0500 Low levels of arsenic exposure linked to increased kidney cancer risk
新算法识别出导致侵袭性肿瘤生长的细胞英国癌症研究中心资助的科学家们推出了第一个能够识别肿瘤内哪些细胞群推动侵袭性生长的计算算法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/New-algorithm-identizes-cells-responsible-for-aggressive-tumor-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/New-algorithm-identizes-cells-responsible-for-aggressive-tumor-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e640ae3e-6bc4-40a3-913c-bdfab1864546 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 22:43:00 -0500 New algorithm identifies cells responsible for aggressive tumor growth
短信提醒无法提高长期服药依从性今天发表在《美国医学会杂志》上的一项新研究显示，对于延迟补充药物的患者来说，短信提醒无助于改善他们一年多补充药物的频率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Text-message-reminders-fail-to-boost-long-term-medication-adherence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Text-message-reminders-fail-to-boost-long-term-medication-adherence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0727b95b-2bf6-415e-ad82-7d344f846b12 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 22:42:00 -0500 Text message reminders fail to boost long-term medication adherence
研究发现怀孕可增强对流感的免疫防御麦吉尔大学的科学家发现，怀孕可能会引发自然免疫力，以增强对严重流感感染的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Pregnancy-strengthens-immune-defense-against-flu-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Pregnancy-strengthens-immune-defense-against-flu-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95f25334-a198-4a39-a71a-19fc5f3e90a8 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 22:31:00 -0500 Pregnancy strengthens immune defense against flu, study finds
CU Anschutz 医学校区获得 4600 万美元用于失明治疗研究科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学校区将从卫生高级研究计划局 (ARPA-H) 人眼同种异体移植 (THEA) 项目获得高达 4600 万美元的资金，以推进旨在通过人眼移植治愈完全失明的开创性研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/CU-Anschutz-Medical-Campus-receives-2446-million-for-blindness-cure-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/CU-Anschutz-Medical-Campus-receives-2446-million-for-blindness-cure-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6734b04d-6a8d-43f8-8f8a-0d363b724d50 Mon, 02 Dec 2024 22:01:00 -0500 CU Anschutz Medical Campus receives $46 million for blindness cure research
肯尼索州立大学教授获得资助研究肯尼亚癌症治疗的可及性肯尼索州立大学教授赫尔曼·“吉恩”·雷获得了肯尼亚国家癌症研究所的拨款，用于了解肯尼亚实施医疗改革的情况下获得治疗与结果之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Kennesaw-State-professor-receives-grant-to-study-cancer-treatment-access-in-Kenya.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241202/Kennesaw-State-professor-receives-grant-to-study-cancer-treatment-access-in-Kenya.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8fba326-e3bd-40e9-b099-8f775143a67a Mon, 02 Dec 2024 21:59:00 -0500 Kennesaw State professor receives grant to study cancer treatment access in Kenya
